page.title: 14CLUBS Gatacre Pavilion
page.content: The Pavilion is used for Day Club organised by Shropshire County Council.It meets five days a week. It is for four to nine elderly people.These people come from different areas (Ellesmere, St Martins and Knockin). On different days they do various things. These things include knitting, crochet, cards, scrabble, baking, and painting. They sell the things they make to pay for outings.The clients are collected at 10.45 by minibus.The Day Club ends at 2.45;the clients are given lunch.This service gives the relatives of the elderly a break.Also table tennis and keep fit are played in winter evenings.
